Theming

Theming

Eden UI uses a flexible theming system built on Tailwind CSS and tailwind-variants.

Color System

Every component supports 20 color variants:

Primary ColorsSemantic ColorsNeutral
primaryredgray
secondaryorange
blueamber
indigoyellow
violetlime
purplegreen
fuchsiaemerald
pinkteal
rosecyan
sky

Customizing Tailwind

Extending the Color Palette

Add custom colors in your tailwind.config.js:

Override default fonts:

Component-Level Theming

Using tailwind-variants

Eden UI components use tailwind-variants for styling. You can extend component themes:

CSS Custom Properties

Override CSS variables for global changes:

Dark Mode

Eden UI supports dark mode via Tailwindâ€™s class strategy.

Manual Toggle

System Preference

Note

The dark class must be applied to the <html> element for Tailwindâ€™s dark mode to work correctly.

Component Size Variants

Most components support consistent size variants:

SizeDescription
xsExtra small - compact UI
smSmall - reduced padding
mdMedium (default)
lgLarge - increased padding
xlExtra large - prominent UI
